Literature.Title: Massetolides A-H, antimycobacterial cyclic depsipeptides produced by two pseudomonads isolated from marine habitats.
Literature.Author: Gerard J, Lloyd R, Barsby T, Haden P, Kelly MT, Andersen RJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium tuberculosis(MIC=10-20µg/ml),Mycobacterium avium-intracellulare(MIC=10-20µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(no activity data),Escherichia coli(no activity data)
